data.actual_result: The "Set this link to never expire" option is turned on
data.expected_result: The "Set this link to never expire" option should remained turned off
data.short_description: Set link to never expire switch resets after opening share menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that you can generate invite links for - Tap on "Create Instant Invite" - Make sure that the "Set this link to never expire" option is turned off - Tap on the invite link and wait for the sharing options to appear - Close the sharing options by tapping outside of them - Note that the "Set this link to never expire" option is now turned back on
